messages.text: i’m going to jump, father
What the hell is it now? I’m at the office, working.
yr always working
To provide for you and the rest of the family.
Colin and Connor are starting university in the fall and
i know all about my brothers’ successes
Then try to be more like them!
And stop wasting my time!
i’m going to stop wasting yr time! and mine! if you’ll just
Are you finally going back to high school to get your
i’m going to jump!
i know u hate me, father
I hate the choices you’ve made. Pills, alcohol, boyfriends...
i’ve made a good choice this time, father. a choice you’ll approve of
What’s that supposed to mean?
What do you want?
u never listen do u?
I’ll listen when you start making some sense!
What is it now? Cutting? Purging? More acting out – doing what!?
yr a bastard!
And you’re a spoiled child who’s always feeling sorry for herself!
So what is it you want now?
I’m very busy.
i’m going to kill myself, father. put u out of yr misery and mine
You want me to call Dr. Weintraub again? Is that it?
it’s too late for that
i’m finally going to accomplish something, father
Stop calling me ‘father’! I’m your...dad.
are u?
I don’t have time for this non
u never have time for me!
I’ve wasted too much time on you!
You’re sixteen years old. You’re going have to start accepting responsibility for your bad decisions.
If you’d just try to emulate your brothers..
STFU about colin and connor! i’m not them! ok!?
i’m yr daughter!
i used to be ‘daddy’s little girl’
remember?
dad?
I remember.
I...we were so happy when you were born. You were such a pretty little
that didn’t last long, did it, dad?
It lasted until you became a teenager and started acting up for no reason and
i was bullied at school, dad!
and at home! by yr two wonderboys
I don’t believe it! You make up stories to try to justify
u never believed anything i ever said!
You’re immature, impulsive, and self-centered. Dr. Weintraub says
you should’ve listened to me! you should’ve protected me, Dad!!
DAD
i know...u were working
when a girl really needed her dad.
I’ve spent countless hours and dollars getting you help from some of the
We’ve been through all this before, Melody.
one last time, huh, Dad? for old times’ sake
at least we’re finally talking to each other again :-/
Dad?
What do you want, Melody? I’ve got a lot of
i just wanted to say goodbye
i’m on the Skybay Bridge. u can see me from yr 40th floor office window
What are you talking about!?
You’re wasting
look out yr fucking office window! use that fancy telescope of yrs!
can u do that much for me...Dad!?
Melody?
Melody!?
What the hell are you doing up there, Melody!?
Melody, get down from there! RIGHT NOW
do u see me waving, Dad? i’m waving goodbye
i’ll never disappoint or embarrass or upset u ever again, Dad
Melody!
Stop!
Please! GET DOWN
i’m finally going to do something to help u out, Dad
something that takes ‘strength’ and ‘courage’ and ‘determination’
u know...all the things u said i don’t have.
MELODY! GET DOWN OFF THERE AT ONCE!
it’s beautiful up here, Dad. bright sun and blue sky and down below...blue water
way down below
I’m calling the police, Melody! They’ll get you
they’re already here, Dad. along with a whole crowd of people
u can watch it all from yr office, Dad. u won’t even have to get out of yr chair
MELODY
i guess i just wanted to say i’m sorry, Dad
i’m sorry for all the trouble i caused u. i’m sorry i couldn’t measure up to
I’M COMING TO GET YOU MELODY
yr working, Dad. remember? yr a busy man
I’m leaving the office. RIGHT NOW
I’M COMING FOR YOU MELODY!
I’M GOING TO...
protect me, Dad?
it’s a little late for that, don’t u think?
it’s NEVER too late Melody!
you’re my daughter! my only daughter
Dad’s going to protect you from that mob and those policemen Melody!
protect you...from yourself
you’re my daughter!
and...i’m your DAD
i’m a failure, Dad. u said so
you’re a beautiful talented smart young woman with her whole life ahead of her!
i’m on the bridge Melody!
do you see me!?
yes
wow! u really fought yr way through that crowd
i’m fighting for my daughter!
you’re worth fighting for Melody! i should’ve...
i’m coming up for you!
DAD you’ll hurt yourself!
like father like daughter huh? ;-)
how the hell did you get up so high!?
:-) i’ve always been a good climber...remember?
i remember chasing you up those big oak trees we used to have in our backyard when you were little and your mother was still -
i’m coming for you Melody
will you meet me...halfway?
MELODY?
DAD?
tell me when someone is hurting you. okay? even...especially if it’s...me
i’ll listen. i promise
okay Melody? from now on...
i’m coming down, Dad!
